title: Pu`uhonua O H≈çnaunau National Historical Park: Fishing
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Fishing                Fishing      Recreational fishing is permitted in the park. All fishing must be in compliance with Hawaii Department of Land & Natural Resources regulations including open fishing seasons, catch sizes, net type and sizes, and bag limits. Bow and arrow fishing, loaded spear guns and commercial fishing are not permitted in the park.
